description: Built a full CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, SonarQube, Trivy, and Nexus. Provisioned AWS EKS with Terraform and deployed Spring Boot microservices on Kubernetes with monitoring and autoscaling.

title: CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins, Kubernetes & Ansible
description: Implemented Jenkins-based CI/CD for containerized applications on AWS EKS with Docker Hub integration. Automated Kubernetes deployments using Ansible with secure credential management.

title: Azure DevOps: Next.js Application CI/CD Pipeline
description: Deployed a Next.js full-stack app with GitHub Actions CI/CD on Azure App Service. Configured environment variables, optimized production, and implemented monitoring.

title: Team Tracking App
description: Real-time Django + React app with Redis and WebSockets to assign field visits based on location. Managers can track, reassign, and monitor live team activity.
